name: Captive Centrifuge
description:
Hello again, it's yeet! I come to you this time with my new fps game: Captive Centrifuge.

This game was made for GJL 2021 Fall under the theme of "Leave Something Behind". It works with the mechanic of using your arm as a projectile instead of weapons, then you have to go and get your arm back for your next attack. 

Leaving your arm behind and running to the door once it is unlocked can prove more advantageous, I think that is how it fits with the theme.

So please jump in, throw your arm to some bad guys' faces, and use your arm to push buttons (or just headbutt them!) to unlock doors!

Have fun!

Another game made by Yigit Yildiz.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left Mouse to throw arm.

Space to jump, left control to crouch.

R to restart, L to quit.
